xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.3 Abyākatapada » 2.5.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
91.
1444Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
92.
1445Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1446Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1447Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1448(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1449Hetuhetusampayuttadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup2.6 Nahetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika >>
